<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wave Spiral](/Feats.aspx?ID=2985) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 202 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per minute

**Prerequisites**
[Reflective Ripple Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2980)

**Requirements**
You're in Reflective Ripple Stance.

</column>

---

You dip and spin, unleashing a wide whirlpool of water. Make an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) each creature standing on the ground in a 10-foot emanation. These attacks all count toward your multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after you make all the attacks.
name: Wave Spiral
